name: ULTRA|DRIVE (Mobile)
description:
The mobile version of an old short shoot 'em up I made with a 16-bit style. It was made in about a week for a game jam, using the Godot game engine since it was easy to get a good grasp of. I'm looking forward to feedback and advice! I'm sure there will be some bugs or oversights that still need fixing. You might experience audio crackling depending on your browser, and I'm still trying to figure out what is causing it. It only happens when I run the game on a browser, and it looks like it might be an issue with the Godot engine itself.

PC Version: https://bennyc4.itch.io/ultra-drive

There are five levels in total, with the last being a boss stage. Once you get a high enough score in each level, you can move on to the next stage. There are many unique enemy types, as well as health items and powerups that can be dropped from them. Each level has great background art and music made by https://ansimuz.itch.io/, go check him out, he makes some cool stuff! I hope you enjoy the game, and thanks for playing!

(Credits to https://ansimuz.itch.io/ for the art assets and music, as well as https://gamesupply.itch.io/ for the sound effects.)
